title: Yosemite National Park: Recreation.gov Help
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Campground Reservations     Recreation.gov Help                Recreation.gov Help & Contact       Having Trouble Finding a Campground Reservation? This is a common problem from spring through fall. You have two options:   Search recreation.gov frequently; you might find cancellations.   Try camping without a reservation in a first-come, first-served campground.     Have Another Question? Our website also has information about:  How and when to make a campground reservation Each campground in the park, including when they will open and close this year Campground regulations RV camping Half Dome permits  If these pages don't answer your questions, feel free to email us. Please include dates or season of your visit, if applicable. We usually reply to emails within one week.
